summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via global token updates in `frontend/src/index.css` and an updated `shadow-copper` in `frontend/tailwind.config.js`. However, the diff also introduces unrelated Tailwind theme additions (fonts and animations) and updates internal tracking files that were not requested as part of the theming-only change.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed Tailwind font families (e.g., `display: ['Cinzel', ...]`) beyond copper palette/shadow updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update copper palette tokens and any hardcoded copper theme extensions (e.g., `shadow-copper`), not typography changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new Tailwind keyframes/animations (e.g., `fade-in`, accordion animations) unrelated to copper palette updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goals include features unrelated to theming.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` to add/update feature request tracking entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for changes to project tracking metadata; this is outside theming implementation.
